content: Hi all, hopefully this is an appropriate place for this question. I'm working on #69663, trying to make generator captures more precise. With the change I'm working on, I'm now getting an "error: implementation of Foo is not general enough" failure on src/test/ui/generator/auto-trait-regions.rs. I was wondering if anyone has tips for how to debug this.
Like, logs that might be helpful, etc.
Oh, actually it looks like this code is supposed to be rejected, but my change changed the error message we're getting, so I probably just need to update the .stderr file.
